1.name: The Ordinary World
1.description: In which we meet our Hero.

3.name: Refusal of the Call
3.description: In which the Hero digs in their feet.

4.name: Meeting the Mentor
4.description: In which the Hero acquires a personal trainer.

5.name: Crossing the Threshold
5.description: In which the Hero enters the other world in earnest.

6.name: Tests, Allies, and Enemies
6.description: In which the Hero faces new challenges and gets a squad.

7.name: Approach to the Inmost Cave
7.description: In which the Hero makes final preparations before confronting their greatest challenge.

8.name: The Ordeal
8.description: In which the Hero faces their biggest test of all thus far.

9.name: Reward
9.description: In which the Hero sees light at the end of the tunnel.

10.name: The Road Back
10.description: In which the light at the end of the tunnel might be a little further than the Hero thought.

11.name: Resurrection
11.description: In which the last test is met.

12.name: Return with the Elixir
12.description: In which our Hero has a triumphant homecoming.
